author: Rob Picheta and Lauren Said-Moorhouse, CNN
title: Princes William and Harry to appear separately at event honoring Diana | News | albanyherald.com
text: (CNN) — Prince William and Prince Harry will separately take part in an event on Thursday honoring their mother, Diana, Princess of Wales. William, the Prince of Wales, will attend the Diana Legacy Awards ceremony in London, where he is expected to give a speech marking the charity’s 25th anniversary, according to Kensington Palace. kAmp G:56@ >6DD286 7C@> 9:D 3C@E96C w2CCJ[ E96 sF 92D =67E E96 6G6?E[ !p |65:2 C6A@CE65[ 4:E:?8 =@42= AC6DD]k^Am kAm(9:=6 E96 A2:C 2C6 ?@E 6IA64E65 E@ 4@==23@C2E6 @? 2?J A2CE @7 AC@4665:?8D[ E96 2AA62C2?46D ?@?6E96=6DD >2C 6 6G6?E D:?46 w2CCJ BF:E C@J2= 5FE:6D]k^Am kAm(:==:2>’D 2AA62C2?46 >62?H9:=6 4@>6D 2>:5 k2 9C67lQ9EEADi^^HHH]4??]4@>^a_ac^_b^``^F =Qm7C6?K:65 DA64F=2E:@?k^2m 23@FE E96 DE2EFD 2?5 H6==36:?8 @7 r2E96C:?6[ !C:?46DD @7 (2=6D[ H9:49 :?E6?D:7:65 27E6C z6?D:?8E@? !2=246 C6=62D65 2 72>:=J A9@E@ 762EFC:?8 96C E92E H2D =2E6C C6G62=65 E@ 92G6 366? 5:8:E2==J 2=E6C65]k^Am kAmz2E6 92D ?@E 366?
